sourcesContent:
<template>
  <gucp-dialog
    ref="saveDialog"
    :title="$t('userPrivileges')"
    :confirm-label="$t('save')"
    @confirm="onConfirmCreateType()"
  >
    <el-table :data="tableList">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('userName')" prop="username" width="100px" />
      <el-table-column :label="$t('email')" prop="email" width="130px" />
      <el-table-column :label="$t('role')">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-checkbox-group v-model="roleList">
            <el-checkbox
              v-for="item in allRoleList"
              :label="item.id"
              :key="item.id + scope"
            >
              <el-tag type="success">{{ item.name }}</el-tag>
            </el-checkbox>
          </el-checkbox-group>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
  </gucp-dialog>
</template>
<script>
import { getRoleList } from '@/http/api/rolesApi'
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      tableList: [],
      uuid: '',
      roleList: [],
      allRoleList: []
    }
  },
  methods: {
    open (item) {
      this.roleList = []
      getRoleList().then(res => {
        this.allRoleList = res
      })
      this.tableList = [
        {
          username: item.username,
          email: item.email
        }
      ]
      this.uuid = item.uuid
      item.roleList.forEach(val => {
        if (val.id) {
          this.roleList.push(val.id)
        }
      })
      this.$refs.saveDialog.open()
    },
    onConfirmCreateType () {
      let { uuid, roleList } = this
      this.$emit('success', { data: { uuid, roleList }, code: 1 })
      this.$refs.saveDialog.close()
    }
  }
}
</script>
